children.name:
Created new author is not successfully saved
  Expected: OK
  But was:  NotFound

Author with ID 15 was not deleted successfully
  Expected: NotFound
  But was:  OK

Expected: <System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException>
  But was:  <NUnit.Framework.AssertionException:   Tried to delete author with negative ID: -852
  Expected: BadRequest
  But was:  OK

   at NUnit.Framework.Assert.ReportFailure(String message)
   at NUnit.Framework.Assert.ReportFailure(ConstraintResult result, String message, Object[] args)
   at NUnit.Framework.Assert.That[TActual](TActual actual, IResolveConstraint expression, String message, Object[] args)
   at OnlineBookstore.main.utils.BaseHelper.VerifyStatusCode(RestResponse response, HttpStatusCode expectedStatusCode, String errorMessage) in D:\a\OnlineBookStoreAPITesting\OnlineBookStoreAPITesting\main\utils\BaseHelper.cs:line 28
   at OnlineBookstore.test.api.tests.AuthorTests.<>c__DisplayClass15_0.<DeleteAuthorByNegativeNumberId>b__0() in D:\a\OnlineBookStoreAPITesting\OnlineBookStoreAPITesting\test\api\tests\NewAuthorTests.cs:line 297
   at NUnit.Framework.Assert.Throws(IResolveConstraint expression, TestDelegate code, String message, Object[] args)>

Successfully deleted non-existing author with ID 2204819
  Expected: NotFound
  But was:  OK

Updated(Created) new author is not successfully saved
  Expected: OK
  But was:  NotFound

Updated Author BookID does not match the Expected Author BookID.
  Expected string length 2 but was 1. Strings differ at index 0.
  Expected: "71"
  But was:  "9"
  -----------^

Book ID does not match the Created Book ID.
  Expected string length 2 but was 4. Strings differ at index 1.
  Expected: "11"
  But was:  "1874"
  ------------^

Book with ID 34 was not deleted successfully
  Expected: NotFound
  But was:  OK

  Expected: BadRequest
  But was:  OK

  Expected: NotFound

Book Description does not match the expected value.
  Expected string length 58 but was 57. Strings differ at index 56.
  Expected: "Lorem lorem lorem. Lorem lorem lorem. Lorem lorem lorem.\\n"
  But was:  "Lorem lorem lorem. Lorem lorem lorem. Lorem lorem lorem.\n"
  --------------------------------------------------------------------^

New ook PublishDate does not match the Updated Book PublishDate.
  Expected string length 28 but was 27. Strings differ at index 26.
  Expected: "2024-10-06T22:19:35.5929120Z"
  But was:  "2024-10-06T22:19:35.592912Z"
